product_name: Marmot Storm Shield Rain Jacket - Girls' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Keep her dry and ready to take on any weather with the Marmot Storm Shield Rain Jacket for girls. Rain and wind are no match for high-quality materials and careful construction. PreCip(R) 2-layer nylon outer shell is wind- and waterproof while remaining breathable; polyester taffeta lining lies comfortably next to skin and provides light insulation. Seams are 100% taped, reinforcing waterproof fabric. Marmot Storm Shield rain jacket includes 2 zippered hand pockets. Full-length front zipper features double storm flaps for extra protection against the elements. Closeout.
short_description: Keep her dry and ready to take on any weather with the Marmot Storm Shield Rain Jacket for girls. Rain and wind are no match for high-quality materials and careful construction.
